channel.title: Comments on: Adding a PubMed Search Field

item.title: By: Gail Persily
item.dc:creator: Gail Persily
item.description: Oooo, I like the readability of the new text style.
item.content:encoded: Oooo, I like the readability of the new text style.

item.title: By: Andres Panado
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description: i think this is very helpful. it's one less click for users if they can quickly search in pubmed as soon as they go on our library hompage, particularly since it's what they used the most. thanks!
item.content:encoded: i think this is very helpful. it’s one less click for users if they can quickly search in pubmed as soon as they go on our library hompage, particularly since it’s what they used the most. thanks!
